title: Predicted
description: Shy Ellen meets protective Nick when Nick's nephew barrels into their life and classic cars will never be the same again! Ellen is persuaded to take a chance by her teenage daughter, after all, what harm will a text do? As witnesses to an insurance scam, things heat up when Ellen becomes the offender's target of intimidation, something Nick will not stand for. Can he capture Ellen's heart and keep her safe? This is a Sweet with Heat romance, suitable for 18+ with a happy ever after
author: Louise Murchie
